definition: the act of pursuing in an effort to overtake or capture, to cut a furrow into a columns
details:
noun
- the act of pursuing in an effort to overtake or capture
= synonyms: pursuit
- a rectangular metal frame used in letterpress printing to hold together the pages or columns of composed type that are printed at one time
verb
- to cut a furrow into a columns
= synonyms: chamfer, furrow
- to cut a groove into
= example: to cut a groove into
- to go after with the intent to catch
= example: to go after with the intent to catch
= synonyms: tag
- to pursue someone sexually or romantically
= synonyms: chase after
